Rage 0.1

Reference

All functions

R0()

Calculate net reproductive value from a matrix population model

Rage-package

Rage

ageSpecificRepro()

Calculate age-specific reproduction from matrix population model

ageSpecificSurv()

Calculate age-specific survivorship from matrix population model

collapseMatrix()

Collapse a matrix population model to a smaller number of stages

dEntropy()

Calculate Demetrius' entropy from a matrix population model

identifyReproStages()

Identify which stages in a matrix population model are reproductive

kEntropy()

Calculate Keyfitz's entropy from a matrix population model

lifeExpectancy()

Calculate life expectancy from a matrix population model

lifeTimeRepEvents()

Calculate the timing of lifetime reproductive events

longevity()

Calculate longevity from a matrix population model

makeLifeTable()

Generate a life table from a matrix population model

matrixElementPerturbation()

Perturbation analysis of matrix elements in a matrix population model

plotLifeCycle()

A function to plot the life cycle diagram based on the matrix model

qsdConverge()

Calculate time to reach quasi-stationary stage distribution from a matrix population model

rearrangeMatrix()

Rearrange stages of a matrix population model to segregate reproductive and non-reproductive stages

reprodStages()

Group the stages of a matrix population model into a standardized set of stage classes

splitMatrix()

Splits a matrix population model into the constituent U, F and C matrices

standardizeMatrix()

Transform a matrix population model to a standardized form

vitalRatePerturbation()

Perturbation analysis of vital rates in a matrix population model

vitalRates()

Derive mean vital rates from a matrix population model
